Name: Kondor
Fate: Constructive total loss, 31 July or 2 August 1944
Displacement:
923 long tons (938 t) (standard)
1,290 long tons (1,310 t) (deep load)
Range: 1,800 nmi (3,300 km; 2,100 mi) at 17 knots (31 km/h; 20 mph)
Armament:
3 × single 10.5 cm (4.1 in) guns
2 × triple 500 mm (19.7 in) torpedo tubes
30 mines
